extendedInfo.description: ChantBuddy turns your mobile device into a loyal mobile chanting companion, tracking daimoku progress and giving motivation to chant more to achieve your personal goals and absolute happiness. Use the social networking, text, or email features to exchange motivation with the practitioner community. Easy to use, with jam-packed functionality. Download this free version. To fully experience a full version, you can upgrade the app through an in-app purchase. Enjoy Chanting!Free Features:Sources of motivation --------------------- - Set your daimoku goals, personal goals, and target dates* Sample personal goals may include: + job, school, + family, personal relationships, work relationships + health, + self-improvement, + business or financial goals. - âDaily Encouragementâ* Receive a daily pop up encouragement * Share the encouragement with others via text/email - Daimoku * Send daimoku to encourage others via text, email, * Share your chanting session via Facebook, Twitter,... - Links to SGI Nichiren Buddhism online resources Built in Timer & Log Chant Time ------------------------------- Every daimoku counts! ChantBuddy precisely records your chanting time - Freerunning stopwatch - Log chant date/time function for accurate tracking Daimoku tracking report------------------------- Progress to date detailPersonalization --------------- - Personalize your chanting speed Upgrade to the full version by using an in-app purchase. New features include:- Chanting audio. Let ChantBuddy chant along with you. - Two new timer modes with sound+vibrate notification* Timer - Set chanting duration target in hours/minutes* Alarm - Set âclock timeâ when to stop chanting e.g. 8:00am, 9:00pm, etc.- Daimoku charts visualize progress to date from 1 day up to 2 year views- Planning report calculates daily/weekly/... chant targets required to stay on track - Personalize app color theme, choosing your favorite- Personalize outgoing daimoku icon (sent to others via text or email)  - Ad-free

reviews.title: Great!!
reviews.comment: Make sure you get your daimoku counted, so you can even set how many daimoku you can chant each minute.   The basic is enough, but it\'s only $3 and out is super stable on my Motorola Droid 2 with Gingerbread.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Buggy and huge improvement gap
reviews.comment: It contains quite a number of bugs like screen jumping around and off of alignment. Would suggest screen auto sleep function when timer is on.. Maybe even the option to auto dim screen. Over all still awesome.. Just wondering why is there a fees..
reviews.author: JunYu Chan

reviews.title: For the high tech Buddha
reviews.comment: Great app, love it! Great to have the Daishonins words right on my phone!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s awesome
reviews.comment: I really like the app.it\'s easy to use and it helps me keeping track of my Daimoku and goals. I highly recommend it. And the people from the support are very nice and efficient
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: Gongyo would make this app better. Daimoku is too choppy, stopping and restarting. Make it smoother and the app will be better.
reviews.author: Paul Cruz

reviews.title: It\'s good. I really do enjoy the daily encouraging quotes.
reviews.comment: When I first started using it I wanted a daily chart of my chanting log-ins, yet like magic a fellow SGI friend gave me a gift of sorts. I know manually record my daily chanting minutes.
reviews.author: S. Vanessa Contreras

reviews.title: Great but somewhat misleading in its application
reviews.comment: This is a great unofficial resource for SGI buddhist members to track personal daimoku campaigns and read President Ikeda\'s guidance but \"sending daimoku\" to someone via text or thru an online application is misleading users on how daimoku is sent spiritually. Pressing the \"send\" button does not equate faith and will throw off new members who think that you can practice Buddhism through an app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app!
reviews.comment: Still a little simple, but a good start to a potentially great app. Would be nice to have the voice reciting the sutra chapters with us like it is available on the sgi website.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent!!!!!:)
reviews.comment: It helps to record the timing,can record the number of daimoku,gives daily encouragement:)Really like the sgi member who created such a useful app:))
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Chant Buddy
reviews.comment: Love this app!!! : ) It really helps keep track of my Daimoku.
reviews.author: Brandon Perry

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: It\'s a fun tool...especiallywhile travelingor on the run.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost excellent
reviews.comment: Really good app. Couldn\'t give 5star because the audio assisted chanting isn\'t quite flowing. There is a time pause and tats disrupt my chanting. But otherwise it\'s a 4 1/2 star rating.
reviews.author: Dhurga Ganesh

reviews.title: Chantbuddy
reviews.comment: I love using this app. It helps me with pronunciation, keeps me going and I don\'t have to mark down how long I chanted since it keeps track for me.
reviews.author: Susan Steiner

reviews.title: Chanting works
reviews.comment: I declared  back in march at Taplow that I would write a phone app with this spec and that it would be ready by the time of the Mens Div Meeting and here one is. Saves me having to write it. But on the other hand  dont disclose your determinations to any other SGI members.  Likewise with the paid version (when its written) does that money go to the KR fund? The adverts pay for it at the moment.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great for its inspirational mission!
reviews.comment: Being able to track my chanting effort is very encouraging!!  I like all the features from daily encouragement, goal setting, sharing, and tracking. It helps me practice with motivation, ease and joy.  Thank you for making it possible!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Questionable Author
reviews.comment: It\'s good, but it could be better.  There are several features that could be added to make this a great app, which I passed on to the author.  This is potentially a great app, good work so far!  EDIT: I lowered my rating, changed the title and shortened the original comment.  I have a concern about the author\'s use of the money from the purchase of this app.  I have made the purchase, because I want the audio.  But three times I asked where the money goes, and I was never given an answer, even when other questions from the same email were answered.  Does he not want to answer?  Why?  Shouldn\'t he be proudly displaying that the money is going to Kofu Fund?  That he\'s supporting the SGI organization with the money generated by his app?  Or is that not happening, and he\'s just pocketing the cash?  That goes against the ethics and principles of SGI, no doubt he knows it.  I urge the author to start making donations to the Kofu Fund equal to or greater than the money being generated from this app.  Until he does so and shows that he\'s doing it, I urge any future users *not* to purchase the full version of this app.  The free version is good enough to track your goals.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Keeps me chanting and on top of the dream of world peace!
reviews.author: Jennifer Anders

reviews.comment: Great apps for NB pratitioal...esp sensei\'s daily encouragement..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Thanks for including and audio portion at different speeds. It\'s really helped with my practice. Thank you!
reviews.author: D William Altig

reviews.title: Simple & works.
reviews.comment: Very simple daimoku tracker, works w/o any issues. Just try not to close the app while chanting cuz the timer will stop--encourages focused daimoku! Don\'t text & chant.
reviews.author: A Google User
